com.mele.games.hex.ui

Class HexArrayRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mele.games.hex.ui.HexArrayRenderer

  • public class HexArrayRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for drawing the contents of the hex array (the main game board). Think of this class as the "view" in a Model/View/Controller pattern. For assistance on color selection, see: http://www.spelunkcomputing.com/colorexplorerapplet.html
    Author:
    Ayar

      • setOffsetX

        public void setOffsetX(int offsetX)
        Parameters:
        the - X offset of where the HexArrayRenderer image is going to be drawn, relative to the parent window in which it lives. Most likely, this will match the "X" parameter passed in to Graphics.drawImage during the update.

        public void setAutoscale(boolean autoscale)
        Parameters:
        autoscale - "true" if the cell size should be scaled from the window space available. "false" to use the set cell size.
